name: Feather Hair Extension Bright Colors + Free Silicone Micro Link!
description:
Salon quality feather hair extensions are great for men, women, kids, teens and even pets!

This extension will include 5 feathers PLUS a free silicone micro link to install your extension for up to 3 months!

Feathers range from 4-12 inches long. Colors for this extension include 1 pink, 1 orange and 3 white, cream, brown or grizzly (black & white) pattern feathers. Each extension will vary slightly as these are real feathers.

Each extension will last 1-3 months depending on how fast your hair grows and how well you care for your extension.

Feathers can be washed, dried, curled or flat ironed. Installation instructions and how to care for your extension will be included as a downloadable pdf file.

Please specify blonde or brown for the silicone micro link when ordering.
